FILE: cm365390v11.0.txt
DYAD: RUSSIA/USSR - DENMARK
RIVALRY: RIV992
DISPUTE(S): MID2864 
RIVALRY: RIV2002
DISPUTE(S): MID4342 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180920 
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180920

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2864 

TERRMID: MID2864 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2864 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2864 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2864 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2864 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2864 3 -- uncertain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2864 from Gibler, Miller, and Little 2016, the Soviet navy seized Danish fishing vessels. Coded not maritime because there was no maritime dispute present, but coded uncertain since GML recommend the MID be dropped, as no protest from Denmark could be found. 

ISLMID: MID2864 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2864 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2864 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2864 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2864 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2864 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2864 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2864 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2864 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2864 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4417 

TERRMID: MID4417 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4417 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4417 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4417 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4417 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4417 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4417 from cm narrative, Russia protested to Denmark over a Danish naval vessel that Russia accused of performing dangerous actions against a Russian naval vessel holding exercises in the Baltic Sea. Coded not maritime because no maritime border dispute was present. 

ISLMID: MID4417 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4417 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4417 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4417 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4417 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4417 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4417 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4417 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4417 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4417 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4342 

TERRMID: MID4342 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4342 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID4342 from Gibler 2018, this is connected to a NATO bombing in Yugoslavia. Russia put its forces on high alert and warned NATO against provoking a broader war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because Denmark, as part of NATO, and Russia were supporting opposite sides of the Yugoslavian Wars, a series of territorial disputes. 

MARITMID: MID4342 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4342 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4342 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4342 1 -- civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID4342 from Gibler 2018, this involves Denmark (as part of NATO) war activity in Yugoslavia, who Russia was supporting. Coded civil war link because the Yugoslav Wars featured extensive violence by militarized rebel groups organized along ethnic lines, and the various states experiencing this violence all lie outside this dyad. 

COUPMID: MID4342 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4342 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4417
rivalry=365390 nationa=DENMARK nationb=RUSSIA/USSR MID4417 20030426-20030426 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE
fatalpb=0 lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Russia protested to Denmark over a Danish naval vessel that Russia accused of performing dangerous actions against a Russian naval vessel holding exercises in the Baltic Sea. First day of dispute was on 4/26/2003 and last day of dispute was on 4/26/2003. 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4342
rivalry=365390 nationa=RUSSIA/USSR nationb=DENMARK MID4342 19990408-19990419 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

First day of dispute was on 4/8/1999 and last day of dispute was on 4/19/1999.

NO DISPUTE NARRATIVE AVAILABLE FROM COW

RIVNOTES: 

RIV2002: new rivalry because MID4342 was added by MID3.02

SOURCES: 
Gibler, D. M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
